Review.Titre: Dishonest Return Policy
Review.Contenu: I bought a $2500 apple MacBook from B&H new in the box. They said they were an authorized apple reseller. They said unconditional money back guarantee within 30 days on the site. Apple also advertises an unconditional money back guarantee, and I assumed an authorized reseller would match them. I used it for a day and realized the operating system version was not going to be compatible with my legacy software. I tried to return and was pointed to the fine print on the site that says the return is unconditional UNLESS you have opened the seal on the box! That's like offering an unconditional return on a car, unless you drive it off the lot. And Apple will not take the product back if they didn't sell it to you. The internet is full of complaints about exactly this--And it's interesting that they have great reviews on all the sites they link to on their web site, but lousy reviews on Yelp.  Why pay the same price to buy from B&H as from Apple, and take the chance?

Review.Titre: Absolutly horrible.
Review.Contenu: Absolutly horrible.. Becuase I had an accent they accused me of being a fraud. Cancelled my order. They were asking for my personal social media accounts etc.. very unprofessional, I just purchased my first camera  needed to get a few accsories but everyone said they were the best so I took the dive and my experience was horrible. Even though I call in to varify I was still treated as a second class citizen even less than. They eventually told  me to go somewhere else when I refused to give me social media.

Review.Titre: B&H order system glitch
Review.Contenu: Applied for a Payboo card to pay for the product I purchased. I can easily update the ship-to address to my new address. In order to update the Billing address, I have to enter Payboo's CID card number. Called Payboo but they can't provide me the CID on phone. It took me lots of time to make calls and and going back and forth trying to update my billing address in the B&H order page and finally place the order.

Review.Titre: Address Selection for Ship/Bill Problems
Review.Contenu: Address selection and saved didn't match for B&H or PayPal.  To make sure selections were saved and correct I went through the purchase process at least 5x's - select billing/select shipping/paypal card/review order.  Beyond frustrating.

Review.Titre: You never set up our Tax-Exemption…
Review.Contenu: You never set up our Tax-Exemption status for easy and convinient online shopping. I need to write back and forth to get my tax portion of payment. It is illegal to pay tax if you are a tax-exempt company. We are a tax exempt company in multiple states. I have been shopping for IL office since long time but again there were tax in my cart today saying that" your tax-exemption status does not apply for IL" which is not correct!

Review.Titre: B&H cost me money
Review.Contenu: B&H shipped my items to the wrong address, even though I updated my address, and they refused to ship another, provide any sort of refund, even a partial one, or do anything. I'm appalled at their customer service. I've shopped at B&H for years, but I'll never spend another dime with them. There are other vendors with better customer service (and websites that actually work and update your address when you tell it to).Edit:In response to the reply, this just goes further to show their lack of customer service.  As I said, I did update my address. I did not receive a delivery confirmation until 12/02.  A large company like B&H should sent out a replacement when they ship something to the wrong address. It's not my fault that their ridiculous system seems to want to default to a 20 year old address, even after I have put in my updated address. Funny how they didn't have any trouble collecting payment from the new address, hmm?  Well I can just take my business elsewhere.

Review.Titre: Ruined my Christmas Suprise!
Review.Contenu: I try to suprise my sister every Christmas, so this year I wanted to buy here a nice photo printer. I called B&H so I could talk to a human and make sure it would be shipped in an UNMARkED box! Sure, they say!!!! Well it shows up in a CANON box with no effort on their part to hide it! Ruined my Christmas suprise! I called them and all I got was a pathetic sorry. Never again!

Review.Titre: the worst and non-reliable shop
Review.Contenu: Never encountered such bad and unethical service. My order was treated in the most unprofessional manner and the staff manipulated us for more than 3 days with no result, making us loose time and pay unnecessary bank expenses and huge international call fees.--------------------------------------------------------------I am sorry to tell you that this is not true, you can check with your staff (Eddie, Levi, etc) that I have provided all the necessary info of the credit card and my bank account joint with my wife (email communication as well as international telephone calls). All they did was keeping us hanging on the international phone call ( for three days and around 30 minutes every time) knowing that i have confirmed on the credit card info and my bank account joint with my wife. When I wired the money as constructed by YOU, and even before checking on the transaction i got a couple of emails stating that the order was cancelled (I talked to Levi that day and he kept waiting on line for half an hour). This is where I decided to drive to my bank cancel the transfer and suffer more expenses. This is ridiculous and very unprofessional; anyway I am glad I cancelled with you, as I have found better my needs with another supplier.

Review.Titre: I am a dedicated customer for years
Review.Contenu: Lens did not connect saying (lens unavalable) and lens was tight to unscrew. Took to USED Dpt and they reffered me to outside company. OUTSIDE COMPANIES findings,"lens and camera corrosion damage we cant help you and sony won't either". They Returned it to me, I turned around got someone to look at it fix it for $150.00. They did, and guess what THE PROBLEM was? The SETTINGS. B&H gave me $25 dollars credit next purchase. Fred moshe Blumenthal   Big Insult/ SAUVER PROGRAM  COMMUNITY BASE PROGRAM FOR YOUTH.self funded by me. Were is the accoutability? very cold blooded. and i shop here all the time. I am shocked. Who is responsible to reinburse me for the money i paid. and why didn't people just check the camera? I was at the last week of my warrenty,Hardly ever used camera. very sad.

Review.Titre: Since the customer service is useless
Review.Contenu: Since the customer service is useless, I'm requesting it here. Hoping somebody can help me. I've been emailing back and forth several days requesting if they can refund the money again since my bank rejected it on October 4 (Order #1101738287) for having a positive balance on my credit card. After all the emails I still don't know if this has been issued or not. Can somebody please just tell me if you refunded me the money for second time already?. Thanks!

Review.Titre: Unauthorized transactions even after I calcelled the order
Review.Contenu: Apparently, European issued cards are very sus nowadays. The most ridiculous email I have ever received."However, due to the fact that this order was paid with a card issued outside the USA, we are missing some important security information, such as address verification and so we have to take additional steps to protect the cardholder, thus your order is on hold. Therefore, we kindly ask; that if you or a colleague of yours has previously shopped at B&H Photo, whether it was online, over the phone or at our Superstore in NYC, we ask if you can provide us with the details associated with that order.However, if this is your first time shopping with us; we ask respectfully that you provide us with some additional information such as a link to your online profile at Facebook or LinkedIn or a similar page; Alternatively, if you have a work email address with a valid domain replying from it will help expedite the processing of your order. Your credentials will not be stored or used for marketing purposes".Excuse you? Facebook? LinkedIn? Fricking order details of another person?Have you ever heard of privacy or is that concept is non-existent in modern America?Am I tripping or even Amazon (a privacy-nightmarish company itself) could not possibly have sent a more outrageous email. Whoever runs your VeRiFiCaTiOn Department, wake up! This is not the way fraud works, this is not the way you treat new customers. They came from your competitors and they can just as easily go back to them!The payment processed just fine when I placed my order. However, it took your VeRiFiCaTiOn Department around 24 hours to suspect the alleged fraud, charge me with another 1$ for nothing and then send me that beautiful email saying I have to prove something to them.What in the name of Christ is that? First experience with this store and the fricking last!UPD. What is even better, they keep charging me 1$ each time they reply to my support request. How cool is that? Oh how ironic, they were worried about the alleged fraud when in fact THEY ARE the real fraud.

Review.Titre: Time out session, debited my account but provided no invoice, super inconvenient on a $6,000 charge.
Review.Contenu: The whole'session time out' feature on your website is absolute ass. It caused my funds to run out when I needed the order to go through smoothly.Contacting Customer Support said 'we are so sorry for the inconvenience but there is nothing we can do.'Being sorry doesn't fix the fact that the site's session loss is what caused the transaction to do a weird pending hit, and now I have to wait for over $6,000 to be refunded to my account again as the amount was debited out.In addition to support, not even offering solutions or merit for the 'inconvenience and just scripting a sorry' does not make me confident in your site.

Review.Titre: I had 5 in my cart
Review.Contenu: I had 5 in my cart, before I could finish checkout, it said it wasn't available.  Now there were 3.  I had to start the process over again.  It stopped again - just 2 left.  That's what I got on the 3rd attempt.

Review.Titre: I just purchased $5K worth of camera…
Review.Contenu: I just purchased $5K worth of camera gear from B&H after purchasing almost $10K last year. I purchased a "recommended HDMI cable for an on-camera monitor that is 6FEET long. I called and said I live 1 hour from the nearest town so I was not about to return the 6-foot cable. Instead of just giving me the 17-INCH cable and thanking me for all my business, I was on the phone for 20 minutes while it was run up the chain to see if they could give me a gift card for the 6-foot cable. Just seemed really petty from a company I have purchase history with going back 15 years.

Review.Titre: Buy out of state if you have no choice or else amazon is better
Review.Contenu: I used to be a loyal BH customer but the company does not care about its custoemrs , bought more than 250 k worth gadjets but no support from B&HPayboo card was a problem but did not get any help from the bank or the company , Card was closed and it says still open , cant open a new card HORRIBLE CUSTOMER CARE AT BH Photo

Review.Titre: B&H Photo is a TOTAL RIP OFF
Review.Contenu: I purchased a one year subscription to Bitdefender and B&H provided me with an invalid license code. Now they wont refund my money. They say this is not a refundable item. B&H are liars and thieves. They totally ripped me off.

Review.Titre: Unable to Check Out
Review.Contenu: I have always purchased online through B&H website but this last purchased I had problem with Check-out when I selected "I'II Handle Myself" for Tax & Duty.  I was not allowed to Check-out unless I select "Fast & Easy Pre-Pay" for Tax & Duty.  I hope B&H look into this Check-out problem.

Review.Titre: After a decade Im done with these guys
Review.Contenu: I ordered a few items totaling about five hundred dollars and the next day my entire order had been cancelled with no explanation. Really? nothing i ordered was in stock? Thats not what the website said. These were common items too. I called their customer service at noon on a friday and they were closed. I didnt get my refund til the following week and now they are spamming my email with customer satisfaction surveys that take ten minutes to fill out and ask essay questions.

Review.Titre: Avoid at all costs, they cancelled my order without a complete refund
Review.Contenu: I am stunned. I have heard nothing but good things about BH Photo & Video but my first experience buying from them has been the most miserable online shopping experience I can remember. I ordered a Christmas gift for my wife on Monday. I'm in Canada, but not prob- they ship to Canada. Great. The Tracking number only ever told me the shipping label was created. I had no attempt to deliver, nobody to my door, no slip, nothing. I have a smart doorbell so I even checked my log. I get a notification today that my shipment was returned. Then I get an email I got a refund. They decided I returned my order (which I never returned, didn't even receive it!) This is annoying, and obviously when your order gets screwed up you call in to see what's going on. E.g. maybe it was a bug, idk. So I call in just to find out they have no idea what happened. So from here they didn't offer to escalate, look into it, etc. That was literally it. They said you could try to reorder. So, okay. I'm not going to try and reorder when you are so incompetent as an org you can't figure out why my first order returned itself. From here it gets worse because they're not even going to refund me the taxes and duties I paid on it. They just confirmed they won't do it because it was paid to Canadian Gov, even though THEY screwed something up in the order. I did literally nothing other than give them business, and they decide that it's okay to steal from me because they messed up my order. What the heck. They also didn't care that I'm also out money from an FX fee charged by my bank for cross currency transactions. They say it's not in their control. Okay obviously it's not, but when you screw me over with something that is COMPLETELY within your control how dare you not make it right for me and get me those couple of bucks back? Just a total failure in customer support and internal process. If they had someone with a sliver of empathy we could have figured this thing out in five minutes. PS. they still can't tell me what actually happened to the order. I'm literally out $25 because I chose to try and give them business. AVOID AT ALL COSTS!

Review.Titre: Continuing Payboo Credit Card fails - and B&H passing the buck
Review.Contenu: I have complained repeatedly to B&H about their selected credit card vendor, Comenity bank (Payboo) and that company's failure to have a working recurring payment system despite saying it works. This is now four months with Comenity being unable to process a scheduled transaction. B&H customer service's most recent response was effectively, "call Comenity." No apology or sympathy, just passing me off.

Review.Titre: The problem is that the item I ordered…
Review.Contenu: The problem is that the item I ordered today was part of a previous order and wasn't included! The previous order had two red cartridges and no ptblack. My ptblack went dry today and when I opened the package previously received, I couldn't print! I can't print until the new cartridge arrives.I need a more reliable source.

Review.Titre: Poor Customer Service
Review.Contenu: Poor Customer Service. Misleading return policy. 10 different Reps and not one cared about customer satisfaction. Would recommend to shop some where if you care about customer service

Review.Titre: service was terrible and not get anything resolved about four
Review.Contenu: I placed an order with five items for some reasonthree of the items put in one category express shipping into the items put into another category friendshipI tried to talk with somebody through the chat but the person simply kept asking for ID number which I had not so yes this is a disappointing action with your company I would not recommend this to anyone

Review.Titre: I had two free microfiber cloths that…
Review.Contenu: I had two free microfiber cloths that were part of a coupon offer but every single time I went to check out they disappeared. I feel like it was a bait and switch scheme. I wasted time throughout the day trying to figure out why I kept getting error messages that removed those two free cloths.

Review.Titre: AVOID THEM AT ALL COSTS - DON'T RESPECT CUSTOMER
Review.Contenu: My husband bought a computer from them.  It was shipped to us and when I plugged it in and tried to use it it immediately had problems.  It shuts down every 3 seconds.  B&H said we couldn't get our money back because it was "taken out of the box."  COMPLETE RIP-OFF AVOID THEM AT ALL COSTS!!!!  I am stuck with a LEMON of a computer and my husband is out almost 600 dollars.

Review.Titre: Charged for return item did not work.
Review.Contenu: They sent a product that was represented to work with a spotting scope for my wife's Christmas. The item did not work as described. when I sent it back they charged me shipping to return the item. I contacted Customer service This was there reply. I apologize for the inconvenience. Unfortunately, prepaid return labels are only provided if a product is defective. Otherwise, a discounted label is issued. Please beware on returned items. They will charge you. Very dissapointed.

Review.Titre: TERRIBLE Interface to select sizes/colors of the print storage boxes…
Review.Contenu: the sizes of the print storage boxes drop front were not listed for all items and when i tired to use the interactive size / color selection interface, it was TERRIBLE. It kept switching sizes when it did not have what i wanted rather than just saying it did not have it. therefore  I could not simply select another color i wanted to see if you had that. Try this out and you will see the issues.

Review.Titre: I returned a defective battery and they never refunded my payment
Review.Contenu: I recieved a defective battery so I opened a return RMA and sent the battery back, I never got a refund. I used thier return shipping lable, the item was delivered with a signature and they will not refund the payment.  Been fighting with them for 3 months and I give up. It's not the $10 its the principle of the matter. They should stand behind thier products and do the right thing.      Update:       Thats great, this has been going on since July 2022, I show proof that the item was returned and they just fought me, denying my refund over and over, until thier bad customer service practices are exposed publicly by my review, then all the sudden they take notice and finally refund me. If no one was watching, they never would have refunded me. It probably cost them way more than $10 in labor for all the months or fighting me and denying my refund for 6 months, certainly wasted a ton of my personal time, ALL OVER $10. Its not the money but the principal. I won't be shopping there again, EVER!

Review.Titre: The worst international shopping experience
Review.Contenu: The package was supposed to arrive on August 3rd. Today is the 11th and the package hasn't even left its country of origin. I wrote to DHL but received no response. I contacted the seller and they told me I have to wait until September 2nd to request a refund. Do not make international purchases

Review.Titre: Last time we ordered sD cards (hundred…
Review.Contenu: Last time we ordered sD cards (hundred of dollars worth), we ordered them for FedEx delivery (1 or 2 days) and paid an extra $35 (approximately).  We needed them for an important professional out-of-town photography assginment.   They not only didn't arrive in time, but arrived weeks after we'd left. We had to instead buy less suitable (and more expensive) cards to replace them.

Review.Titre: Order finally went through on fourth attempt
Review.Contenu: This is the fourth time I have attempted to place this very same order. It finally went through. I had contacted chat support and called the order number but neither was any help ultimately. I try to use other vendors besides Amazon when I can, but when it is this much trouble, I hesitate to do so.

Review.Titre: Very Bad after sale Customer  support
Review.Contenu: I ordered SSL CONNEX Portable USB Microphone through DHL. There is no update regarding the shipment until now .. its been 10 days.. When I contact B&H they are saying they can do anything only after 45 days. DHL said the shipment is not with them. B&H not even asking the local DHL regarding this.. Very irresponsible. I sent many email and always same reply like a robot. Writing now after receiving B&H’s response . .. Here also they copy paste what they emailed .  Not even trying to identify the real issue of Shipping not found.

Review.Titre: Expect Delays, B&H uses FedEx
Review.Contenu: The fact that B&H ships via FedEx makes the entire experience awful. FedEx lied about attempting my delivery (I watched the truck drive right past our front door), then when I called and complained, my B&H package has magically been delayed FOUR MORE DAYS. There must be no fear of recourse or management at FedEx. My business has spent nearly $8000 in the last 12 months (between 2 accts) at B&H and FedEx is makes each experience awful. Amazon sells everything B&H sells, and it never comes via FedEx, so moving fwd, I'll be parting ways with B&H. It's unfortunate, but the DELIVERY is the MAIN PART of a transaction.

Review.Titre: Paypal not supported
Review.Contenu: Tried to use paypal (like I did a million times before since 2001), got redirected to the paypal site, got charged €39,95, wanted to place my order, got an error. Tried again, same thing. Now my credit card is down €79,90 and my order still didn't go through.

Review.Titre: well they are reliable until they are…
Review.Contenu: well they are reliable until they are not ! recently sent me the wrong software and I opened the box ,not realizing it was for a mac ! I ordered for a pc ! Long and short they would not accept a return !

Review.Titre: I had significant problems placing…
Review.Contenu: I had significant problems placing orders.  I called 800 # for support, the first agent didn't attempt to help and transferred me to sales (which wasn't what i was asking).   The sales rep was trying to be helpful but referred me to a email address for support.  Not super helpful.  Finally, I blew out all the contents on the cart and started over which is how I placed the order.

Review.Titre: I stored my Payboo card info so I would…
Review.Contenu: I stored my Payboo card info so I would not need to reenter it everytime. When I select that card to pay with, your system wants me to reenter the card info for security reasons. What's the sense of storing the info if you are only going to ask for it again anyway!

Review.Titre: Unfair customer treatment
Review.Contenu: Unfair customer treatment. I received disrespect from a sales associate (Patrick in lighting). He got frustrated at me asking detailed questions about lighting. After making the complaint, I found out my name was in a negative light with the company.  I was told I can buy from them but can’t return. I made returns due to their items being defective and I assume they felt it hurt their business.It seems I was then targeted for this. The senior manager Brian Markman specially stated “While I understand you are sighting an unusual circumstance, we are not blocking you from making any purchases. We are only stating that if you decide to make a purchase we will not refund or exchange any purchases for any reason. This would include defective, damaged in transit, etc.’”

Review.Titre: Please be advised your financial data…
Review.Contenu: Please be advised your financial data is not protected with this company, if you elect to conduct business your data will be compromised and you will receive unauthorized charges. B&H Photo Video company will not investigate nor care of any damages that it has caused to you and/or your credit. Within the same breathe, they will protect the fraudster and you will be in a continuous yearly legal battle.  This company has been made fully aware of this breach. Again, it is ill advised to conduct business with a company that does not protect nor preserve your financial data in a securely manner.

Review.Titre: I'm not sure why my online orders need…
Review.Contenu: I'm not sure why my online orders need to go through some additional verification process. What happened to the convenience of online shopping where I didn't have to spend additional time trying to get a hold of someone to confirm I had placed my order?

Review.Titre: You could take the order and then fill…
Review.Contenu: You could take the order and then fill it after coming back from Holiday.  No problem in taking a day off to celebrate your faith, but please don't make my come back to check out later.  Just let me know shipping may be delayed a day or two.  Not unreasonable.

Review.Titre: Horrible Return Experience
Review.Contenu: I'm writing this because I am a long loyal customer to B&H but am unfortunately parting ways with the company. I am beyond frustrated at how complicated the return process is. Why in the world do I have to pay for shipping on a return? This is outrageous and I've never heard of this before. While on the phone the agent didn't even mention this to me. None of your competitors charge for returned shipping. For the exact Item I want to return they give you free returns with no restocking fees.I paid $61 on an item that I want to return and have to pay almost $12 to return it. Ridiculous.

Review.Titre: SICK AND TIRED of the annoying "Click &…
Review.Contenu: SICK AND TIRED of the annoying "Click & Hold to prove you are not a bot" page. I had to go through this TEN times whilst shopping on the site in the span of fifteen minutes. Fire your IT department!UPDATE: Typical BH Photo canned answer not paying attention to what the customer was saying. A Captcha for the FIRST visit to the site is fine, but almost every time I was adding something to the CART? Or SEARCHING for another product? Oh, and by the way, I was SIGNED IN to my account with you. Your site site behaves like this every few months so, yeah, it's sloppy coding.

Review.Titre: ordered canon r3 and rf 100-500
Review.Contenu: ordered canon r3 and rf 100-500. applied for payboo credit card was approved for $12,000.00 placed order 2 days later i get email saying to call for verification called said they could not verify and cancelled my order.  placed a new order with different card but cant save sales tax.. when payboo card comes i will re order save sales tax and return  the other order.  AGAIN they canceled my order. Said something about being high risk. Said they would need a wire transfer. I wonder how much money they verification dept has cost them.  Tomorrow morning I will go to THE PHOTO CENTER that’s 5 miles from my house and buy the canon R3  and the rd 100-500. B&H evidently doesn’t need my money.

Review.Titre: I had to pay shipping because I used a…
Review.Contenu: I had to pay shipping because I used a P.O. Box for delivery. I live in a rural area in a town with a population of 600 people. There is no home mail delivery only PO boxes. I don't understand why I have to pay shipping when I have no control over where my mail is delivered. I also think 7 working days for delivery is ridiculous.I also provided you with my street address but your company still chose to charge shipping

Review.Titre: Your payment system sucks
Review.Contenu: Your payment system sucks!  I have been trying to buy stuff on your website on my phone and on my desktop and I am so frustrated that I stopped with just a lens cap.  I have purchased tens of thousands of dollars of camera equipment from B&H over the years but have never been so frustrated.  I want to be a loyal customer, but Amazon is so very much less frustrating!

Review.Titre: Not impressed
Review.Contenu: Not impressed - live in the UK and they appear to offer overseas transactions, but then add multiple anti fraud hoops to jump through and painful response times (I.e they don’t)!Card charged at time of transaction, then order put in hold, now 3 further anti fraud transactions on my card at time of shipping, which my card is not happy with so they want to make more charges on the card and don’t appear to be shipping…They have also changed my location from UK at time of order, and on confirmation, to CA. Maybe they’re better in country, but won’t be using again for international shipments, despite the savings as they’re clearly not setup to support this.

Review.Titre: No Customer service
Review.Contenu: Item not delivered to the correct address by FedEx. Trying to get a replacement but not receiving a timely response from Customer service.Having to reorder this item and reschedule the installation. It would be nice if someone from B&H responded

Review.Titre: I have been a B&H user for years
Review.Contenu: I have been a B&H user for years. It was my "go to" camera vendor for decades. I still use B&H at times because they stock items that are hard to find, but the web site has become such a pain in the ass that I now buy most big-ticket items (bodies and lenses) from others. The B&H site makes it hard to find things even if they are in stock, and routinely rejects credit cards that work elsewhere. Very disappointed.

Review.Titre: when splitting payments
Review.Contenu: when splitting payments, we should just put the amount into first card, pay bo, then the balance should update into second card

Review.Titre: wanted extra battery for a camera I had…
Review.Contenu: wanted extra battery for a camera I had purchased from B&H but they said they could not ship it. Had previously ordered camera with extra batteries and had no problems

Review.Titre: I’ve spent thousands at this store…
Review.Contenu: I’ve spent thousands at this store buying 5 cameras and loads of equipment. Service was always good until I got their Payboo, huge mistake. I paid up Payboo in two months instead of six, then wanting to make another purchase about two months later it blocked me. I asked B&H what was going on - total disinterest.Payboo (Comenity bank) never responded to two written requests and their phone lines never seem to pick up.The person in charge of customer relations contacted me after I sent them a negative email, he seemed very nice. I checked Payboo again. All fine. I sent the B&H manager screen shots of everything. I went back into B&H to buy my $3K of purchases - blocked again.I informed the manager again.More than a month later, no response.You know B&H, you’re not the only retailer in the game, some of us stick with you due to misplaced loyalty.And then we learn.

Review.Titre: They have our money, but we don't have what we paid for
Review.Contenu: My organization ordered a $3,800 hard drive from B&H at the beginning of June that was never delivered. When I called they told me that the issue would be resolved within 3-4 days. It is now 21 days later and there is still no update or resolution. I have spoken with at least 6 customer service agents since that time. Each time I was told that a manager would reach out within one business day, which has not happened. Today, I finally got a manager on the phone, and he couldn't get off the call fast enough. We just want the product that we paid for, or for it to be refunded to the card on file.

Review.Titre: Disappointing shopping experience
Review.Contenu: I purchased one item priced $119 from Europe. The order was charged and put on hold due to an extra verification process for cards issued outside the US. It’s the first time in my life that a company asks me for either my Facebook or Linkedin profiles to verify a credit card. B&H risk assesment It’s really disrespectful and creepy and I immediately canceled the order with the intention of never coming back to the shop again.B&H should know that when someone pays with apple pay, the card numbers are stored in the device and secured by a passcode, fingerprint or face detection. It’s hard to imagine how they have become the giant they currently are with the aforementioned policies.

Review.Titre: I was looking for two items
Review.Contenu: I was looking for two items; I found one. I could not find an Olympus flash unit, and there was no indication of the quality or compatibility of the "will fits" available. The date was March 3, 2023. Your "date of experience" space would not allow me to enter a valid date.

Review.Titre: We didn't received the check for the cash back.
Review.Contenu: My CEO has an unclaimed property and they notified us about it. I called on behalf of my CEO and asked if we could get it as a cash back instead. I am advised to email in order to process it. I emailed immediately after that call on May 21, 2023, and they responded to our email on May 31st. They asked for the details to put on the check and we gave them immediately. We have been following it up but they are not responding. Review.Titre: Bad Customer service
Review.Contenu: I've been a loyal customer of B&H Photo for over two years, and I've always appreciated their wide range of products and excellent customer service. However, my recent experience with their return policy has left me quite disappointed.I purchased 3 rolls of  Canon Heavyweight Matte Coated paper for my Canon 4100, but unfortunately, I realized it was the wrong size. The product was still untouched and sealed in its original box, but because I had cut the tape off the box to inspect the paper, I was told that I couldn't return it. This was surprising and frustrating, especially considering that the product itself was undamaged.I understand the importance of return policies to prevent fraud, but in this case, it felt like B&H Photo was prioritizing policy over customer loyalty and satisfaction. I've spent approximately ten thousand dollars with them over the years, and it's disheartening to see that they weren't willing to accommodate a simple return in this particular instance.What makes this situation even more frustrating is that some of their competitors allow open box returns, which I've always considered a customer-friendly approach. I never thought such a minor issue would be met with such inflexibility from B&H Photo.In the end, I could have easily resealed the box with new tape, and no one would have been the wiser, but I believe in honesty and integrity. I hoped B&H Photo would share those values, especially since the product was in perfect condition.I hope B&H Photo reevaluates their return policy, considering the loyalty and support of their long-time customers. As for me, I'll have to think twice before making future purchases from them, knowing that their return policy might not be as customer-centric as I had previously believed

Review.Titre: Updated with Reply! DO NOT BUY - THEY DON'T REFUND DEFECTIVE ITEMS
Review.Contenu: So I’m editing this reply to answer Mr. Posners reply. Mr. Posner. You are incorrect. First of all, the file created on my case DOES say that the drive is defective. I happen to know this because somebody read me the file. Also, one of your sales associates, whom I spoke to at length, told me that this was the wrong drive for me all together, and that the same thing was likely to happen again that is… It was likely to work for a few days and then stop working. I did not save the packaging because it was working fine for five days , I also did my homework and looked up what  is the best drive to save photos on and this particular drive was mentioned. However, the sales associate said he has heard many times about this kind of thing happening when you are trying to download a large file set, and he told me that in fact, I really should be able to exchange for the proper drive, which he told me the name of. He wrote a special note into my  complaint, describing the issue and recommending that I’d be allowed to exchange for the correct drive. When I asked him if there was something I should have noticed about the description that would have alerted me that this was not appropriate for me, he said no there is nothing in the description that would’ve alerted you it just isn’t the right drive. He recommended two other options. Bottom line is I was willing to buy a more expensive drive if I could exchange this wrong one,  but your customer service refused me three times saying my only option was an even exchange for yet another WRONG DRIVE. As far as I am concerned, your customer service was terrible. I bought a recommended hard drive for a recommended use. It failed after five days. Your service person told me I should really have a different drive altogether, because this was likely to happen again . And now I am stuck with a drive that will never work for me even though I only bought it less than a week ago. Beyond that, I was willing to do an exchange for a much more expensive item as long as it would work for me.  I do not understand why the description of this drive makes me think it will work for me, and then your sales associate tells me it won’t. It fails, and you refuse to even exchange for something that will. I did not keep the packaging because it’s a hard drive, and it was working fine for five days. I do not understand why your management team cannot make this right for me. I am stuck with a hard drive I can never use.I am happy to go into detail and prove every point I have made if you care to discuss it further. As a former investigative reporter for the program “60 Minutes” I am totally aware of what is right and what is wrong in consumer matters and what your team and B&H Photo did was WRONG. Now I am going to be stuck with hundreds of dollars of (to me) useless gear.  339-970-1202 I bought a 12T hard drive formatted for my Apple computer ... then after one week siting on my desk downloading 10T of photos from the cloud, it failed to mount. I had thrown away the packaging as it never occurred to me after it worked fine initially that it would BREAK in a week. Now all they are willing to do is send the THE SAME THING. This is despite the fact that their own sales person said the product is WRONG for my uses and will break again!  I want to exchange for the right product or get a refund. The customer service was APPALLING.

Review.Titre: Reconsidering Loyalty: B&H Photo's Troubling Partnership with Comenity Capital Bank
Review.Contenu: For years, B&H Photo has been a trusted name in the photography and videography world, but their recent partnership with Comenity Capital Bank has raised serious concerns about their commitment to customers' well-being.Questionable Partnerships: B&H's decision to partner with Comenity Capital Bank for the Payboo Card has exposed their loyal customers to questionable financial practices. This bank's history of what many, including myself, deem predatory behavior is widely documented. Such an association is surprising and deeply disappointing from a brand that holds such a reputable position in the market.Shared Responsibility: By choosing to do business with a bank with a contentious reputation, B&H Photo is indirectly subjecting its patrons to potentially deceptive and harmful financial practices. While B&H might argue that the responsibility lies with Comenity, it's essential to acknowledge that B&H's endorsement of the Payboo Card makes them complicit. They cannot turn a blind eye to the experiences their customers face due to this partnership.Reputation at Stake: B&H's association with Comenity Capital Bank has already begun to tarnish their otherwise stellar reputation. It's a classic case of a company's actions speaking louder than their words. B&H Photo needs to seriously reconsider this partnership if they wish to maintain the trust and loyalty of their vast customer base.In conclusion, while B&H Photo has always been a reliable source for high-quality photography and videography equipment, their business decisions, particularly their association with Comenity Capital Bank, have cast a shadow of doubt. I urge potential customers to be cautious and make informed decisions when considering financial products associated with B&H. And to B&H Photo - your customers deserve better.====Let me take a moment to respond to you, I appreciate Brian's effort to improve the customer satisfaction, but the case is far from over. was B&H liable for its partner's fault? Yes and No, you can say that's what Comenity Capital Bank's problem, that's right, but it is B&H's choice, I would not even know who is Comenity if it were not because I was doing business with B&H, bird of a feather flock together, that's how perception work, in today's business environment, perception is just reality. So you got to be very careful in choosing who you partner with. Again, I would urge B&H sever the business relationship with Comenity, if you read the reviews of this bank, it is not hard to conclude, theft is a habit. what else you are waiting for?

Review.Titre: Ordered a set of speakers and returned…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a set of speakers and returned them. B&H credited the Payboo account as that is how the original order was paid for, even though I requested a refund. This, of course, required me to use the funds on the B&H website. I wanted to place another order and requested clarification that the credit on the card would go to the new order. Received a canned answer from customer service with a link to the bank managing the account instead of answering my question. Should have requested a credit with B&H instead of a refund. Would have been clearer what would happen when placing a new order.

Review.Titre: Been waiting for help with tax exempt…
Review.Contenu: Been waiting for help with tax exempt questions as the payment card billing address is different than the company physical address- Online chat sent me to a tax exempt contact phone number - waited on hold and then entered call back info under the premise I would NOT LOSE MY PLACE IN LINE- that was 4 hours ago!  I had to process the order and ended up being charged an additional 104.00 in taxes! NOT HAPPY with the service AT ALL!!

Review.Titre: Used department need improve

I phoned B&H twice and spoke to two different agents each telling me that I would get my quote in a couple of hours. I also emailed directly to Organizational Sales. There was just two items on the quote. Finally I gave up and ordered full price.

Review.Titre: I feel very frustrated
Review.Contenu: I feel very frustrated. I ordered 2 items as gifts for my son, who lives in a different state. His address was the default. The problem was that I chose to use PayPal as my method of payment. During the process of paying, PayPal then changed the shipping address to match my billing address, so his gifts are being sent to MY address, instead of his! PayPal does not furnish the details, such as a shipping address, as they process a payment.I am disabled, and now I will need to return these items, and my son will not have his gifts in time for his birthday. I just reordered them, but did NOT use PayPal as my payment method!I like B&H Photo-Video's site very much, but this experience has tarnished that image. It's easy and quick to order items, but that's only good if the end result is what one expects.

Review.Titre: Although B and H used to be great the…

They switch banks with no notice and then they invalidate their own card with no notice......oh but you can reapply with another bank.  No thanks my credit score does not need B and H.  Adorama and Amazon are beathing them these days anyway.

Review.Titre: Worst Prices $100 Premium Than Even Amazon
Review.Contenu: I don't care how "great" their customer service is. They have some of the most GARBAGE prices ever. ALWAYS. Ryzen 7 5600G $325. EVERYWHERE else $220-$260. Never use BH for PC equipment unless you want to get ripped off massively. Do your DD. Trust me this company literally steals from it's customers.

Review.Titre: I have had a Payboo account from before the bank change.
Review.Contenu: I have had a Payboo account from before the change to Comenity Bank. I went to use my card and find out that I can't. I know for sure that I made all changes when the bank was changed from Synchrony bank to Comenity because I have it in my own handwriting and all prior info from Synchrony bank. Comenity Bank already had my NEW ID and password in their account files. I was charged a $30 late fee (all prior payments were made auto from my checking account) which was reduced to $15 by a bank rep after a phone call. B&H should make up the $15 difference of the late fee as I have done nothing but be a loyal and timely payer of all debts owed to B&H. NOT MY FAULT.

Review.Contenu: Phones cut off before end of stated business hours. Had to order online.  Could not find a way to input my church tax exemption. Chat also said it was available, but never responded during business hours. CS reps are always very personable when I can finally get through the wait period and speak to someone, or else it would be one star.

Review.Titre: The website is flawed
Review.Contenu: The website is flawed, either that or else no one is monitoring the Tax Exempt input process.  However, after a lengthy wait time, I got to a representative who helped me get my Reseller's Permit attached to my company's account.From here on out I will be able to give a 5 star rating, as I find the website excellent.

Review.Titre: After being a customer for 15 years
Review.Contenu: After being a customer for 15 years, I asked to return an item in exchange for a different one that had never been used. Customer service indicated this was not possible since it was 30 days after the original purchase. I asked to speak with a supervisor and was told the same. Guess you don't need my business, I have found that Adorama is interested in me as a customer and so have moved my purchases of cameras & accessories to them.

Review.Titre: Changed my address twice still sent to wrong address
Review.Contenu: Changed my address twice before clicking to submit the order, received the confirmation email with the incorrect address.  Requested an update for my address to be fixed, but they apparently do that manually and I have to wait for them to respond, but my package may be sent to the wrong address before they respond.  Very frustrating experience.

The Symphony bank provides zero support, and is, so far as I can tell, basically a scam operation. I'm disappointed I wasn't able to get my CA sales tax on the $4500 Payboo card limit refunded. Review.Titre: I love B&H but hate their shipping…
Review.Contenu: I love B&H but hate their shipping policy.  You never know when a signature will be required.  It would be good to know before hand so I could decide whether to ship to my office or my home.

Review.Contenu: they have a robust selection and fast delivery, but I am very frustrated whenever I speak with them for customer service even when placing an order.  They are very "New York" and have little patience even when Im trying to give them my money.  I feel like im hustling through a subway and they are pushing me to get it over with asap.  Have felt that way about them for 20 years.

Disappointed as it was my first order from b&h. Would have preferred just being sent the missing parts. Not impressed with customer service.

Review.Titre: Everything was great as usual BUT,
Review.Contenu: Everything was great on B&H's end as usual, however, since my payboo card was discontinued and went to a new bank, I had to apply again with this new bank. Unfortunately, even with an 820 credit score, I did not receive an instant approval like the previous bank and save my Tax. I called the new bank to find out the application status and I was told that it would take 10 business days for it to process, never heard of that long of wait with any bank in the past. So I reduced my cart to the bare minimum and decided to use another store with a similar reward program for the remaining items.

I decided to order the same product again and process the order through my credit card directly. Website thought I was a bot during the checkout process. Upon googling for my need, I was directed back to B&H to other options more suitable for my use the technician didn't even mention. Review.Titre: Gift cards make you pay tax! even if you have a boo card.
Review.Contenu: if you use a gift card it for some reason puts eh cost of the item on the gift card but hten puts all the tax on the Boo card but only gives back 8% of the tax so you end up paying 92% of the tax. This makes using gift cards more exspensive so i will never get them again.

Review.Titre: worked on an order for several…
Review.Contenu: worked on an order for several days...then come to find out B&H cant ship cameras with lithium batteries to North Carolina.  surely the location of consumers can be picked up from something in the meta tags of the html and then let customers know when the problem item goes into the cart rather than an error check on the order followed by a "there was a problem with you order, we can't ship batteries to NC"

Review.Titre: After recently giving you a 5 star…
Review.Contenu: After recently giving you a 5 star review, the lens I ordered was different than the one I receved.  Promptly returned it for exchange for the right lens.  Due to your policy of not sending out the correct order until you receive the wrong lens, even though it shows it is in transit, caused me to rebuy the lens in order to fulfill my professional obligations.  Trusting you not to charge me twice.  I feel better customer service was due me considering I have been a 20 + year customer.   Expedited delivery of the lens I originally ordered was expected as part of good customer service considering it was your mistake.  This is the second time the wrong lens has been sent to me.

Review.Titre: Problems with payment
Review.Contenu: I spent 4 hours trying to make my order with my debit card, nobody could help me ... after try many different options of addresses and cards, I had to use Paypal and pay extra money for something that must be easier in the web site. Hope you can make something about it, for the clients like me that want to buy from other countries. Thanks.

Review.Titre: Our company is Tax Exempt
Review.Contenu: Our company is Tax Exempt - have been for 43 years.We have a PO Box for billing purposes and since our Exemption certificate address is our physical address, but our credit card billing address is a PO Box, B&H forces us to pay sales tax. This will be my last purchase

Review.Titre: The chat did not succeed in finding the…
Review.Contenu: The chat did not succeed in finding the Op Tech extender loop strap at BH. So I googled the question and found another site with the item, then used that term at BH, which did indeed have the item. So I ordered it at BH. But this took over an hour of back and forth which would have been much easier and faster if BH chat had been able to phrase the search term properly. He did refer me to some one with more expertise, but they never showed up and we times out.This is the only time in 20 years when I have been a bit peeved.

Review.Titre: Difficulties with the ordering process
Review.Contenu: Difficulties with the ordering process. Have had used items removed from my cart while waiting for the 'checkout' to reopen on Saturdays and then informed that; "Sorry" it is not available, it was sold!"Ordering with PayBoo card does not always work.

Review.Titre: UP until now have had good experiences…
Review.Contenu: UP until now have had good experiences with B&H but today got fobbed off and not helped when having to purchased a product that failed...it means I have now purchased 4 products, as the first two failed, and the response I got today was to just "go talk to the manufacturer"...pretty shoddy and poor customer service IMO...they got their sale out of me today as I need the item...but also someone who has had a very bad experience with their business practice as well

Review.Titre: Origin of Manufacturing Concern
Review.Contenu: As a consumer, I care greatly about where my products are made. I spent 30 minutes today calling around to see where different microphone stands are made. This information isn't available on the product pages. I have to call and ask. All but one manufacture in China. I want you guys to more clearly state where products are manufactured, and I want you to do better at finding American made products. The vast majority of products are going to China. The CCP virtually owns all these companies, and the money we send there funds their activities. It's not good. Please do what you can to remove any avenues through which money is flowing to the CCP. Thank you.

Review.Contenu: Bought Canon printer ink from them and one cartridge was empty. Told them and they sent me the replacement but the whole package is showing low ink after a month or so while I only printed only few pages per month for my personal use at home. Contacted and they said contact the manufacturer!

Review.Contenu: Why did I have to pay shipping?  I have ordered over $200 worth of merchandise--I have not paid shipping for item over $100 in the past--why now?

Review.Titre: Not enough of info in the descriptions
Review.Contenu: What I did not like about shopping for a monopod is that the reviews seemed to be about all models and not just the one I was looking at.   Plus the video review attached to the monopod I was looking at, was not the same monopod, so it was useless.   I even looked on the Manfrotto website for a better description of the differences between the different Manfrotta monopods and that really did not help.  I wanted to know why Manfrotto used the snap locks vs the twist locks and some other comparable info like that too.   Can't seem to find it anywhere, so I am  not blaming B&H, just giving my 2 cents.

Review.Titre: B&H's web site has gotten more difficult to use
Review.Contenu: It was difficult to find the item I was looking for.I have moved so I needed to update my shipping and billing addresses. Changing the shipping address was simple but the billing address change was confusing.

Review.Titre: I was surprised...
Review.Contenu: I was surprised when I spoke to someone in the buying department about the possibility of doing an exchange of a lens for a teleconverter, that it was assumed that I was trying to avoid paying tax.  I would not seek to avoid taxes, and was trying to avoid stressing my credit card before the holidays.  It idoes not seem to be good business to suggest that your customers have dishonest intentions.  I do appreciate that you do not do exchanges on used equipment, and that message can be delivered without prejudice....I received a phone call from a B&H manager who appropriately dealt with my concern. I am impressed with the professional response and trust that staff retraining will avoid a repeat of the episode. Thank you B&H.

Review.Titre: Payboo application process experienc …
Review.Contenu: Using Firefox browser during checkout. Payboo application did not work for me with immediate use as expected. Applying for Payboo in popup or new tab did not form correctly on my monitor, having too much unreadable instructions that were blocked in subsequent overlay windows. Additionally the No Robot Catcha photos required during picking miniature objects were grainy in a 2x3"popup window, multiple tries, and on my 32" monitor was disgusting. Hence now I have to wait 7 to 10 days for approval by mail. I previously had original Payboo from Synchrony bank that was discontinued by B & H that worked immediately for use during check out. Now if approved 7-10 days by mail, calling B & H customer service within 30 days will credit me the tax. This on the Z8 and kit. This review is for Payboo application process during checkout. One can only ask yourself, is it worth saving the sales tax? However B & H has always great customer service for me, being a customer for over 20 years.

Review.Titre: Very difficult to apply a gift card on…
Review.Contenu: Very difficult to apply a gift card on mobile. Signed in to desktop and item did not appear in my cart. A page element to show gift card balance instead out dated credit card number. Proceeded OK after going through estate of order routine. On mobile no link to add gift appeared when using Paypal or in regular check out.

Review.Contenu: I could not input my correct city name, hope it arrives

Review.Titre: When I tried to apply our tax exempt…

Review.Contenu: Because it said qualifies for free shipping, but at checkout charged $15.05.  Why?

Review.Titre: Easy to order but description was…
Review.Contenu: Easy to order but description was seriously lacking and confusing. Had to work to find dimensions. Showed "think tank" insert but also showed that as an extra cost option. I'm still not sure if it comes with the order. If it doesn't I'm going to return this purchase. Everything should be far clearer and if the insert is included, it shouldn't show as an "option".

Review.Titre: Nice web site and support - awful return policy
Review.Contenu: Great chat support will point you in the right direction but not the exact solution. Easy-to-use GUI online shopping and fair shipping policy. Return policy not good like at Amazon. If you receive a non-functioning purchase, B&H refuses to schedule a UPS pickup for returns during COVID spikes even when it's available in your area. So after receiving a broken item, B&H will further inconvenience their customer - insult to injury.

Review.Titre: A $75 discount was not honored
Review.Contenu: A $75 discount for the "K-Tek KE-89CC Avalon Series Aluminum Boompole with Internal XLR Cable" is why I ordered. The discount did not present itself during the entire order process. Very disappointing. Is it still possible for B&H to honor this discount for this order?On another front; Online chats and Cust Srv phone calls have very limited hours, particularly with PST. More accessibility to help would be appreciated.

Review.Titre: Don't know if this product needs a six pin connector or not.
Review.Contenu: There is no info on this product about whether or not it needs an extra power cord from the power supply to run. When I called, the salesman said I did need a cable. But when I asked the website, the answer was that I did not need the cable. If the question was answered incorrectly, I will have to return the product.

Review.Contenu: You asked me to re-enter my Payboo Credit Card which I don't have access to. I tried to chat with you to see if you could place my order manually using my Payboo card but after waiting on the chat for 25 minutes for someone I gave up and used my Mastercard..... My Payboo card info was saved to my account but when I clicked on it as my method of payment another window came up that said for security reasons I had to re-enter the information. I didn't think about going to Payboo FAQ- I thought I would be able to clear it up on a chat...  maybe you need to add to your chat system how many people are in front of you so you have an idea of how long or how many people need to be serviced before you will get to the person waiting!

Review.Titre: Tries to convince you to go into debt
Review.Contenu: When I went to check out, B&H blocked me from seeing the checkout screen. The only thing I could see was a pop-up ad for credit cards. I hate that sort of thing, so I started looking on other websites instead.

Review.Titre: Checking out did not go smoothly
Review.Contenu: Checking out did not go smoothly.  I wanted to use PayPal and selected that (twice), but received no feedback that the order was complete.  Finally selected the other checkout button and eventually had to pay via credit card.  Frustrating and not how I wanted to make this transaction.

Review.Titre: Some good; some OK.
Review.Contenu: I liked that I was able to easily discriminate between the different models and options while shopping.What I did not like was the fact that once the item was in my cart, it did not list the details (model number, RAM amount, SSD storage amount), so I *hope* I'm ordering what I intended to order. I also did not like the announcement--mid-order, that the order could not be completed at that time because of Shabbat.

Review.Titre: I liked the fast shipping, but not the unnecessary additional shipping charge
Review.Contenu: I liked the fast shipping on the product I purchased last night after closing (PST).  However, when I immediately tried modifying the order to add an additional item to save on shipping, the online system did not allow me to do so and advised me to call.  When I called first thing in the morning, I was told that it was too late to modify the order and that I had to purchase the second item separately with the additional shipping charges.  That did not leave me feeling all warm and fuzzy about my shopping experience with B&H thus far...

Review.Titre: What I Like & Dislike about B&H
Review.Contenu: I like that this company can deliver to your door step so you don't have to worry about the post office. I think that the customer service is kinda helpful, depending on what question you ask them about electronics, etc. But what I don't like about this company is, some of the items on there site are special order only. I guess that means they don't have the item in stock at the store. Other than that I guess everything else is fine.

Review.Titre: I am returning a product that I bought by mistake and purchasing a replacement
Review.Contenu: I am returning a product that I bought by accident.  I meant to order the charger, not the battery.  They're allowing me to return it, which I guess is good, but they're charging me to return the original item even though I'm buying the charger as a replacement.  I don't think that's very good customer service.  If I wasn't buying a replacement, I would understand, but I don't agree with your policy.  Rep was pleasant enough, but he didn't answer my question about the return shipping fees.  I saw it on the RMA that he provided.  Then I had to get on another chat to get my question answered.  I should give you a 2-star, but I really don't like to give bad reviews.

Review.Titre: Items shipped to wrong address.
Review.Contenu: Items ordered  and shipped on Jan. 3. Should have received them Jan. 5. Gave B&H my correct shipping and billing address. Items delivered Jan. 5, but B&H, instead of using my correct address, sent them to an address I have not been at in over 7 years. My options are to wait for wait for the items to be returned to B&H, have the return processed by B&H, then, either refund my credit card, or have B&H reship them. Who know how long the packages  will take to be returned, and am I going to be held responsible for he return when I never received the items? I went ahead and reordered the items, and told B&H to keep the returned items. A big pain in the ass. Glad I did not need the items when I should have received them.

Review.Titre: i very much like B&H for my photography…
Review.Contenu: i very much like B&H for my photography needs, however   i was looking for Li-Ion batteries and a dual charger and the selection/options were terrible.   i found the batteries but finding a charger for them was a royal pain in the ass and truth be told i don't have a lot of confidence in the one that i purchased.   several others had terrible reviews and yet these items are still being sold on this site.....makes me wonder a bit about how diligent B&H is about following up on the products and reviews their customers buy and review on here....seems that there's some products that should be removed from your site!   if the customers are saying the product is garbage, then it would seem to me that this product does not represent the quality that we want to be associated with our name and our brand and should be removed.just my opinion but i would not want my name or brand associated with inferior products or services like that...

Review.Contenu: I tried to pay with a Centurion Card and it did not work.I tried to pay with Apple Pay Master Card and it did not work.I tried to pay with PayPal and it finally went through but this causes me to pay a fee so B&H owes me.Prior to checking out, I went online searching for B&H Promo Code for a 5% to 20% discount and I could not find any relevant promo codes.  I do not want a promo code for a new rag.  You need to make life simple and have 5% to 20% promo codes readily available.   I would not purchase from B&H again unless I had to.  You do not make the shopping experience fun.

Review.Titre: Disappointed with Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I'm disappointed. One of my shipments went to the wrong address, and I never received it. B&H didn't do anything to help me and said it was out of their hands. In some ways I get it, but when I found the shipping problem, I contacted them immediately. This was before delivery even happened. They could have contacted FedEx, but instead said it was their policy not to do that. I contacted FedEx and tried to have them route the package to a holding facility, but they delivered it anyway...and some stranger signed for it.As a result, I'm most likely out $1000+ dollars. While this was in part my fault, I would expect a company that cares about their customers to actually offer some sort of assistance when mistakes happen. At the very least, they could have contacted FedEx about the delivery and told them to send it back.I'm still giving them three stars because they have been my go-to camera company for the last five years. I recommended them to everyone. That being said, I never had a problem with an order. I figured customer service would take care of me if I ever had a problem. I moved to a location out in the country recently and am afraid to order anything else from them on the chance there will be a problem with the delivery.

Review.Titre: I don’t recommend Allstate…go with Canon CarePAK Plus!
Review.Contenu: I have shopped for years here. I would have rated 5 stars as usual BUT I cannot this time. I purchased over $5k worth of items and realized I did not purchase an extended warranty. I contacted the company via online chat and when they recommended I contact Allstate to ask about their coverage they gave me 2 wrong numbers. I’m not dinging them for that. What I am most upset about is when I called to talk to them they did give me the correct number. After I did more research on my own I realized I did have another option…a much BETTER option for warranty called Canon CarePAK Plus. It is $80 more then what it cost through Allstate but HELLO I want my equipment serviced by CANON so why wouldn’t I want that? It bothers me that I only stumbled across this option on accident while researching reviews for Allstate (which were all over the place). Canon CarePak reviews were 4.9 stars. This should be offered FIRST to all B&H customers upfront. I am disappointed they don’t promote it. This will NOT keep me from shopping from B&H. They have always been my go to photo store. I just hope this helps other customers when it comes to choosing a warranty.

Review.Titre: Love B&H but Payboo/Comenity bad
Review.Contenu: Love B&H but Payboo/Comenity bad. I previously held a Payboo/Synchrony card, but am having major issues switching to the new one with Comenity. I've tried to apply multiple times for the card, the first time I had to get on the phone to "verify my identity" which there was some kind of snafu and they were apparently unable to verify me, so just denied the application with no appeal or 2nd attempt to verify me. Tried to reapply but have received no reply or confirmation of application from Comenity. So now I have to pay the tax on my purchase, even though I've been able to avoid that in the past. Review.Titre: About refund
Review.Contenu: UPD 10.27.23. Refund received, problem resolved. In this regard, I am changing the rating in the review, but I would like to note that questions for the support service still remain. In particular, what saddened me most about this experience was that I did not receive answers to all the questions and had to constantly ask again. But in any case, thank you for resolving the issue.On October 11, 2023, I placed an order in the amount of $5161.85. After paying by credit card, I received a message that the verification department could not confirm this payment, for some mystical reasons (the card was in my name, they were provided with all the necessary data). I was asked to pay for the order via wire transfer, which I did. The order was confirmed and sent, BUT the payment that was made from the credit card was never refunded. After this, a long conversation with technical support began, which is more like a conversation between a deaf person and a dumb person. It makes absolutely no sense to ask more than one question in a letter, they will answer at best one question, the rest will be ignored. I asked to provide me with documents confirming the refund, to which the support employee replied that my bank was allegedly rejecting the refund. They cannot provide any documents that confirm the fact of rejection. Technical support claims that there were several attempts to make a refund, but my bank allegedly rejected them. To the question - how can I get a refund in another way, I did not receive an answer. The support person keeps telling me that my bank is rejecting the refund. After much correspondence, I was told that I needed to request a “charge back” from my bank, but my Indonesian bank CANNOT initiate this process without confirmation from the merchant. Once again I'm waiting for a response from support. Yesterday I wrote to them that my bank requested confirmation for the return and the support employee replied that the order was delivered! They are even too lazy to read the history of the dialogue before answering. I don't understand why I have to spend so much of my time solving this issue and how it is possible to solve customer problems so poorly. It's a terrible, disgusting experience. Absolute ignorance of the problem that arose
